name: Flappy Owl (itch)
description:
In this frustratingly hard and highly addictive one touch arcade game you need to time your touches with extreme precision to get the bird as far as you can before crashing.

FEATURES:
★ Best tap to flap action around.
★ One touch controls.
★ Quick game. Pick up and play.
★ Smoothest gameplay with accurate physics.
★ Flap your way to infamy with online worldwide leaderboards and ranks.
★ Die all the time.
